title: Designation
description: An applicant applies to one or more **programs** through **designations**.  **Programs** render a **decision** for the **designation**.

links.description: Display the designation for the applicant with the given applicant CAS ID and program ID.
links.title: Show

links.description: Update the designation with the given applicant CAS ID and program ID.  **NOTE:** Currently, we only allow decisions to be updated when the `local_status` is `null`.
links.title: Update

decision_id.description: The unique identifier for the decision to set.

local_status.description: For programs using WebAdMIT to manage their admissions process, a local status is a way for those programs to enter their workflow into WebAdMIT.  Typically, these programs will tie a decision to a local status.  Decisions are used for reporting at a national level (or school-wide level for UniCAS), but local statuses are for an individual program's process.

id.description: Unique identifier of this local status.

title.description: Human-readable title for this local status.
